RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 1 6F Dirt CR: 78. Claiming Purse 8500. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON THREE RACES SINCE OCTOBER 22, 2022 OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE APRIL 22, 2023. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since September 22 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,00 0 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SAG HARBOR emerged in upper stretch rallying from mid track to get up in time. JOCKO ROAD pressed a narrow lead to upper stretch digging in late to outside pressure ceding grudgingly at the end. BEYOND GONE pressured the pace through the turn into upper stretch weakening late. QUICK ENTRY a step slow through the turn swung seven wide in upper stretch. HONOR LIFE hustled along pressed three deep through the turn then flattened out in upper stretch. SMOOTH PAPA chased on the inside through the turn then would tire in upper stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: Quick Entry
ENTRY.COMMENT: step slow, swung 7 wide lane

ENTRY.NAME: Smooth Papa
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased inside, tired lane

ENTRY.NAME: Sag Harbor
ENTRY.COMMENT: emerged upper stretch, rallied up mid track

ENTRY.NAME: Jocko Road
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed narrow lead, dug in lane, ceded grudgingly

ENTRY.NAME: Beyond Gone
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, extended into lane, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Honor Life
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled three deep, pressed to 1/4 pole, flattened out,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 2 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 59. Claiming Purse 7800. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since September 22 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SECRET SEDUCTION pressed on the turn dueling abreast rival through the lane clearing late. RHYTHM FOREVER pressured the pace along the inside dueling from the rail down the stretch ceding the issue late. MISS LINDYSUE pressed the pace checking between horses at the quarter pole racing evenly down the lane. NOGRATZ was never involved. BAY OF ANGELS was always outrun. AN OBJECTION FROM THE RIDER OF MISS LINDYSUE AGAINST THE RIDER OF SECRET SEDUCTION CLAIMING INTERFERENCE NEAR THE QUARTER POLE WAS DISMISSED BY THE STEWARDS.

ENTRY.NAME: Rhythm Forever
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, dueled from rail lane, ceded late

ENTRY.NAME: Bay of Angels
ENTRY.COMMENT: always outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: Nogratz
ENTRY.COMMENT: never involved

ENTRY.NAME: Miss Lindysue
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, checked between 1/4 pole, finished evenly,

ENTRY.NAME: Secret Seduction
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed on turn, dueled abreast lane, cleared late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 3 6F Dirt CR: 56. Maiden Claiming Purse 7700. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: COMMISSIONER H slow early lagged through the turn emerging in upper stretch surging clear in the closing yards. SECOND LIEUTENANT sent clear set the pace saving ground to upper stretch digging in along rail ceding late. HOPPERNESS raced evenly moving along the inside down the lane lacking surge there. CAPTAIN BERNARDO was pinched back at the break. RECTANGLE was never involved. WILDCAT HAGRID chased through the turn folding in upper stretch. FORT STROOPE displayed poor action after leaving the gate and was pulled up, walked off after the race.

ENTRY.NAME: Rectangle
ENTRY.COMMENT: never involved

ENTRY.NAME: Captain Bernardo
ENTRY.COMMENT: pinched back at break

ENTRY.NAME: Commissioner H
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, lagged turn, emerged top lane, surged clear

ENTRY.NAME: Second Lieutenant
ENTRY.COMMENT: sent clear, set pace, dug in rail, out finished

ENTRY.NAME: Hopperness
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly, inside to lane, lacked late response,

ENTRY.NAME: Wildcat Hagrid
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace, faded lane

ENTRY.NAME: Fort Stroope
ENTRY.COMMENT: poor action, pulled up, walked off

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 57. Maiden Claiming Purse 7700. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: STELLAR LEGACY sent clear set the pace drawing off in upper stretch being kept to a drive late. SHES HOT TO TROT went evenly through the turn chasing a loose leader down the lane digging in to save place. LA KADENZA chased on the turn extending down the lane racing evenly there. GIO'S MY DAD gained on the rail in upper stretch leveling off late. FRANCIA (PER) chased through the turn weakening in upper stretch. HAUGHTY KITTY played no factor. PACKIN was always outrun. FANG MEIN LIED in close at the break was outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: Gio's My Dad
ENTRY.COMMENT: rail move top lane, leveled off

ENTRY.NAME: Shes Hot to Trot
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly, chased loose leader lane, saved place

ENTRY.NAME: Fang Mein Lied
ENTRY.COMMENT: in close break, outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: Stellar Legacy
ENTRY.COMMENT: sent clear, set pace, drew off lane, kept to task

ENTRY.NAME: Haughty Kitty
ENTRY.COMMENT: played no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Packin
ENTRY.COMMENT: always outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: Francia (PER)
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace, weakened lane

ENTRY.NAME: La Kadenza
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased on turn, extended lane, finished evenly,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 5 2F Dirt CR: 83. Claiming Purse 11000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (Winners At Two Furlongs in 2022-2023 To Carry An Additional 2 lbs. For Each Such Race Won).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BORN FOR VICTORY sent hard dueled up while in close between horses. PERFECT GENTLEMAN pressed all out four deep to the wire. CAJUN MANDATE dueled between horses staying right there to the end. SKYLAS GOLD dueled in close between horses to the end. DELAYED ENGAGEMENT led inside ceding to outside pressure. OFFUTT COLE was pinched back early. AN OBJECTION FROM THE RIDER OF OFFUTT COLE AGAINST THE RIDER OF SKYLAS GOLD FOR INTERFERENCE AFTER THE BREAK WAS DISMISSED BY THE STEWARDS.

ENTRY.NAME: Delayed Engagement
ENTRY.COMMENT: led inside, ceded last yards

ENTRY.NAME: Offutt Cole
ENTRY.COMMENT: pinched back early

ENTRY.NAME: Skylas Gold
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled in close between horses

ENTRY.NAME: Cajun Mandate
ENTRY.COMMENT: duled between, right there

ENTRY.NAME: Born for Victory
ENTRY.COMMENT: sent hard, dueled up in close

ENTRY.NAME: Perfect Gentleman
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed all out, four deep

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 6 1M Dirt CR: 68. Claiming Purse 8300. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE OCTOBER 22, 2022 OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since September 22 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: HERE COMES JIGS stalked the pace pressing on the far turn extending abreast rival down the lane edging clear late. DESIGNATE advanced on the backside pressing in bid on the far turn, ceded ground to rivals in upper stretch coming again late to save place. SUSIKIN sent clear set the pace being pressed on the far turn extending on the inside down the lane weakening late. GRAND VENUS stalked the pace racing evenly to upper stretch lacking surge there. CHAMPAGNE SISTER played no factor. SECRET AFFIRMATION was always outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: Susikin
ENTRY.COMMENT: sent clear, set pace, hooked inside to lane, weakened late

ENTRY.NAME: Here Comes Jigs
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, pressed lane, edged clear late

ENTRY.NAME: Grand Venus
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, lacked late response,

ENTRY.NAME: Champagne Sister
ENTRY.COMMENT: played no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Designate
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move, pressed far turn, saved place

ENTRY.NAME: Secret Affirmation
ENTRY.COMMENT: always outrun,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 7 6F Dirt CR: 86. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 18800. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OR CLAIMING PRICE $12,500. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since September 22 Allowed 3 l bs. Claiming Price $12,500 (Claiming Races For $10,000 Or Less Not Considered In Estimating Allowances)(W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DYRDEK set the pace clearing on the turn widening under a drive down the lane. TWO GUNS chased the pace extending to upper stretch proving no match for the winner. ROAD MINISTER a step slow early finished evenly. CONSTITUTION COAL hustled along would tire in upper stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: Dyrdek
ENTRY.COMMENT: cleared on turn, dug in lane, widened driving,

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Ron Kirk, John Bates & Michael Riordan

ENTRY.NAME: Two Guns
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased the pace, extended lane, clear second best,

ENTRY.NAME: Constitution Coal
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled along, tired,

ENTRY.NAME: Road Minister
ENTRY.COMMENT: step slow, raced evenly lane

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 8 6F Dirt CR: 83. Claiming Purse 12400. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since September 22 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: C J ALL THE WAY pressed to lead on the turn coming three deep in upper stretch drawing out late. SCRATCHOFF pressed on the turn vying between horses in upper stretch proving no match late. RED GUN raced evenly moving five wide down the lane gaining a spot late. HOUSEBUILDER a step slow early finished evenly six wide. CONSIDER ME pressed the pace from the inside to upper stretch tiring late. RIVER ANT faded on the turn.

ENTRY.NAME: Consider Me
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, tired inside lane

ENTRY.NAME: River Ant
ENTRY.COMMENT: faded on the turn

ENTRY.NAME: Housebuilder
ENTRY.COMMENT: step slow, even finish 6 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Red Gun
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly, 5 wide lane, gained a spot

ENTRY.NAME: Scratchoff
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed on the turn, between foes top lane, saved place

ENTRY.NAME: C J All the Way
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed to lead turn, three deep lane, drew clear,
